name: RUSSIA BATTLEGROUNDS
description:
RUSSIA BATTLEGROUNDS is a multiplayer battle royale shooter and your trip to hell. Here start's battle of unarmed prisoners, in which the strongest wins. Also, you are waiting for unusual meetings with unknown anomalies and mysteries. Only your aggression and cruelty will help you to save your skin by killing all the players to last one. Welcome to Mother Russia.

Features:
  • Retro-style
  • Many unusual locations and secrets
  • Dynamic gameplay
  • Highest level of optimization
  • Translation into 24 languages (Ugandan too)
